content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Operation at (-14, -15)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (24, -15) mining coal
- Wooden chest at (23.5, -16.5) collecting coal output

### Iron Mining Operation at (-14, 23)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-14, 23) mining iron ore (currently out of fuel)
- Wooden chest at (-14.5, 21.5) collecting iron ore
- Two stone furnaces at (-11, 20) and (-9, 20) for smelting

### Copper Mining and Smelting Complex at (20, 20)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (20, 20) mining copper ore
- Complex inserter and chest network:
  - Output wooden chest at (20.5, 21.5)
  - Middle wooden chest at (22.5, 21.5) storing copper ore
  - Final wooden chest at (24.5, 17.5) storing copper plates
- Stone furnace at (24, 20) for smelting
- Multiple burner inserters for automation:
  - Inserter at (21.5, 21.5) moving ore between chests
  - Inserter at (22.5, 20.5) feeding furnace
  - Inserter at (24.5, 18.5) moving finished plates
  - Support inserters at (20.5, 22.5) and (22.5, 22.5)

ERROR TIPS

### Errors with belt connections
- Cannot connect belts directly from wooden chests - use inserters instead to move items from chests onto belts

### Errors with furnace fuel management
- Check furnace fuel capacity before attempting to insert more coal
- Current furnace at (24, 20) is at maximum fuel capacity (50/50)

### General automation tips
- Multiple inserters are idle waiting for source items - ensure proper item flow in the production chain
- One mining drill is out of fuel - implement regular fuel resupply system for all machines
